postReview.title: Southampton 1-0 Everton: Late Armstrong strike seals Saints' first win
postReview.description: Southampton's winless start to the Premier League season looked like it might continue, but Adam Armstrong was their hero at St Mary's.

QAData.question: Who won between Southampton and Everton on Sat, 02 Nov 2024 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Southampton won 1–0 over Everton on Sat, 02 Nov 2024 15:00:00 GMT.
